snippet: Ethiopia was stripped of 3 points in World Cup qualifying for fielding an ineligible player, handing South Africa a lifeline for next year’s tournament in Brazil.
lead_paragraph: Ethiopia was stripped of 3 points in World Cup qualifying for fielding an ineligible player, handing South Africa a lifeline for next year’s tournament in Brazil.

headline.main: Ethiopia Penalized in World Cup Qualifying for Ineligible Player
